workItems.title: Requirements doc
workItems.description: Write final SiteSnap requirements at docs/sitesnap-requirements.md

workItems.title: Tech approach + AI prompt design
workItems.description: Andrei writes tech approach (R2, Sharp, API design). Kai designs Gemini multimodal classification prompt. Parallel.

workItems.title: Design spec
workItems.description: Robert designs: home screen, job creation, photo timeline, camera flow, comparison generator, search, empty states, upgrade prompt.

workItems.title: Backend API + R2 integration
workItems.description: Jonah builds Express API: job CRUD, presigned URL generation, photo metadata, Gemini classification integration, thumbnail generation (Sharp), comparison endpoint, search API.

workItems.title: Apple IAP payment integration (updated from Stripe)
workItems.description: Howard designed Apple IAP payment architecture, receipt validation via App Store Server API v2, Apple S2S webhook handler, subscription status middleware, and free tier enforcement. Documented in docs/sitesnap-payments-spec.md.

workItems.title: Expo mobile app
workItems.description: Zara builds Expo app: Clerk auth, home screen (job list), job creation, camera capture + upload pipeline, job timeline with type badges, comparison generator, search, share, subscription upgrade flow.

workItems.title: Design review
workItems.description: Robert reviews implementation against design spec. Lightweight visual check.

workItems.title: QA pass (release gate)
workItems.description: Enzo: full code review QA covering auth flows, job CRUD, photo upload/classification, comparison generation, free tier gating, Apple IAP payment flow, edge cases. Verdict: CONDITIONAL PASS. Two potential integration issues (B-1 comparison format mismatch, N-6 API response shape) need device verification. All 3 Atlas critical fixes verified. Report at docs/sitesnap-qa-report.md.

workItems.title: App Store copy + marketing
workItems.description: Priya writes App Store listing copy, screenshot set, one-liner pitch for Facebook trade groups.

workItems.title: Documentation
workItems.description: Nadia writes App Store description, brief FAQ, privacy policy (photos stored in R2, AI classification, no data selling).

workItems.title: Post-launch retrospective
workItems.description: Yuki runs retrospective analysis after first week of live data.

workItems.title: Fix comparison API client (B-1)
workItems.description: Update api.ts generateComparison() to parse JSON response {comparisonUrl, comparisonId} and fetch image from presigned URL, instead of calling res.blob() which expects binary data. The server was rewritten (Atlas C-3 fix) to return JSON with presigned URL.

workItems.title: Verify API response shape (N-6)
workItems.description: Server returns {jobs:[], hasMore, cursor} and {photos:[], hasMore, cursor} but client PaginatedResponse type expects {data:[], hasMore, cursor}. Check if job list and photo timeline render correctly on device. If broken, update api.ts to map response keys.

workItems.title: Device testing pass
workItems.description: Run full QA on iOS device/simulator: comparison flow, job list rendering, camera capture, Apple IAP Sandbox, upload queue on cellular, presigned URL refresh, Clerk auth, performance targets, accessibility (VoiceOver), dark mode rendering.
